about.details:
Incorporated in 2008, Suratwwala Business Group Ltd is a real estate development company developing commercial and residential projects in Pune District. The company focusses on the development, sale, and maintenance business of properties. Suratwwala also provides the space on rent for banners, hoardings, and towers on buildings and unsold space for a particular time duration.

The company has completed one residential projet of 16 one BHK Apartments and one commercial project named Suratwwala Mark Plazzo - Phase I in Pune district. The company is working on Phase II of the commercial project.

A major portion of the revenue of the company is derived from the development of real estate projects. The project of the company includes both affordable housing and premium housing developments. For maintenance business, Suratwwala Business charges fees from the owners of the units of each project.

Competitive Strengths

1. Diversified Business Model
2. Strong presence in Pune district
3. Land identification capabilities and strong execution

faqs.question: What is the Suratwwala Business IPO?
faqs.answer:
Suratwwala Business IPO is a SME IPO of 4600000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹6.90 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹15 per share. The minimum order quantity is 8000.

The IPO opens on August 3, 2020, and closes on August 5, 2020.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Suratwwala Business IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Suratwwala Business IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Suratwwala Business IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Suratwwala Business IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Suratwwala Business IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Suratwwala Business IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Suratwwala Business IPO opens on August 3, 2020 and closes on August 5, 2020.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Suratwwala Business IPO?
faqs.answer: Suratwwala Business IPO lot size is 8000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Suratwwala Business IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Suratwwala Business IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Suratwwala Business IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Suratwwala Business IPO will be done on Monday, August 10, 2020, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, August 12, 2020. Check the Suratwwala Business IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Suratwwala Business IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Suratwwala Business IPO listing date is on Thursday, August 13, 2020.
